metadata.description:
It's Boston in the 1920s. Famed Harvard archaeologist Clifton Jennings, international adventurer and discoverer of ancient treasures, has some adventures no one knows about. He's a member of a Secret Society, one that guards against supernatural threats and unscrupulous meddlers in the black arts. However when Jennings and his Secret Society hire a resourceful yet seedy private eye by the name of Ace Mifflin to assist them on cases and that's when their troubles really begin.
 
FROM CREATOR TED SLAMPYAK
 
Jazz Age, the comic was nominated for an Ignatz Award in the category "Outstanding Online Comic" in 2003 and named one of the best webcomics of 2004 by The Webcomics Examiner.
metadata.name: Jazz Age Chronicles
